name: Jquery-semantic-tabs
body:
jquery-semantic-tabs ======================== Description ----------- SemanticTabs is a jQuery plugin which convert any html list into a tabbed content. Example usage ------------- Example html:

  1. Solution Name One

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse vitae ullamcorper nisi.

  2. Solution Name Two

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse vitae ullamcorper nisi.

  3. Solution Name Three

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse vitae ullamcorper nisi.

Attaching the plugin: var myTabs = new $.listToTabs('#solutions'); Destroy the plugin: myTabs.destroy(); Plugin options -------------- You can change the following plugin options: var defaults = { prefixClass: 'tabs-', // Default Tabs classes and id prefix headingTag: 'h3', // Each content block heading tag, id or class startTab: 1, // Number of tab to be opened on initial page load easeDuration: 200, // Animation duration firstChildClass: 'first-child', // Tabs li:first-child class to support old browsers lastChildClass: 'last-child', // Tabs li:last-child class to support old browsers }
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
